name: Chaos Orchestra -- An Audio Only Game
name_original: Chaos Orchestra -- An Audio Only Game
description:
Press the RIGHT ARROW, UP ARROW, and LEFT ARROW keys to reprimand the corresponding section when they play badly.

Press SPACE when the band messes up the tempo.

Song: "Sleigh Ride"

Version by The Funny Valentines: http://thefunnyvalentines.de/

Music from http://www.cambridge-mt.com/ms-mtk.htm
